PHRASE.LANG:
The Morphsuit™ Bundle for Women contains a great selection of Morphsuits™.
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Morphsuit™ - Evil Surgeon (Women)
 (2) Morphsuit™ - Skeletonwhite (Women)
 (3) Morphsuit™ - Zombie (Women)
 (4) Morphsuit™ - Pumpkin (Women)
 (5) Morphsuit™ - Vampire (Women)
 (6) Morphsuit™ - Frankenstein (Women)
 (7) Morphsuit™ - Killer Clown Black (Women)
 (8) Morphsuit™ - Purple Witch (Women) [#Legal]

 (6) Morphsuit™ - Frankenstein (femme)
 (7) Morphsuit™ - Clown meurtrier noir (femme)
